attributes.action: Increase the mileage allowances allowed before being subjected to tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The mileage allowances for use of private cars on company business which is exempt from tax have not increased since April 2002. In nearly 8 years, the costs of motoring have increased significantly in that time. We ask that the mileage allowance is increased in line with the costs of motoring over that period.
